reviews.review: Amazing game, with hard levels and interesting story. Best Co-Op game you can find for puzzle game at this price range, especially when it is on discount.

Portal 2 makes you feel like batman. It is like the darksouls of videogames but with portals and without the darksouls. It is a very fun puzzle game that contains portals. Portals are used for a lot of things and also portals. You use portals to solve puzzles with portals by shooting portals out of your portal gun portals. But watch out some puzzles with portals also contain very difficult portals and also some easier portals. Most puzzles should be solvable with portals. Without portals this game would be quite impossible but with portals it is a very good game. In co-op you can have 4 portals in total even though the title is portal 2. Which doesn't make any sense like what why is the title 2 when 4 portals idk. Portals are a very good thing in this game. You need to find 600 portals to continue to level 4 and that makes me very happy. Finding the portal 2 is very rewarding by letting you portal to level 4. Level 4 is very good and you have to use multiple portals to get through it. I sure do love portals haha. some might say i have a little obsession over them. (Don't tell anyone I have a glados body pillow) But what this all portals down to is this. Portal 2 is a good portal. It makes you feel like portals and the portals are portals. I would rate this game a 10/10 but after thinking about it it is more like a portal2/portal. Portal Portal Portal Portal Portal Portal Portal Portal Portal. Is what a Portlemon would say lmao xd. But tbh portal 2 is very fun and you should try it out everyday everysecond everyportal. it very fun. BYE this was my review of portal 2 i hoped you enjoyed it.

Portal 2, Simple jeu ou expérience vidéoludique?

Portal 2 est un jeu dévellopé par valve et sortit en 2011, sur PC PS3 et XBOX 360. Le jeu est, un jeu d'énigmes en vue FPS, prenant part dans un futur indéfinit mais proche du post-apo. Vous y incarnez Chell, un sujet de test dans un laboratoire dirigé par des machines, dont la principale, Glados veut vous tuer aprés le sort que vous lui avez resservé dans le dernier opus. 

Le Valve's univers, un univers passionant et frustant.

En effet, le jeu se situe dans l'univers crée par Valve, qui comporte la totalité des jeux crée par Valve de CS à Half Life en passant par Portal. Le tout englobé d'une histoire commune passionante et quelque peu WTF par moment. Portal 2 est donc (jusqu'à ce jour) le point final de l'univers de Valve, la semi-conclusion qui vous laisse rempli de questions et de doute. L'histoire est donc riche, trés riche. Mais rien ne vous sera clairement expliqué, Valve ne veux pas de joueurs passif se sera donc à vous de rechercher l'histoire en fouillant et en vous baladant a travers les niveaux. Procurant donc aux jouers les moins attentifs un sentiment d'air con et pour les autres un sentiment d'accomplisement lorsque vient la fin du jeu.

D'ailleur le jeu c'est bien ou pas?

Le gameplay du jeu reprends celui du premier, tout en le complexifiant et en l'améliorant notemment avec de nouveaux élèments que je vous laisse découvrir. Le tout englobé dans une perdition sans nom au vus des environnements qui par moment vous donnera sans doutes un mal au crâne profond et douloureux. Merci Valve <3 .

Conclusion:

Portal 2 est bien plus qu'un jeu, c'est une expérience. Par son scénario digne des plus grands livres de littérature de SF et d'anticipation. Mais aussi par son gameplay toujours aussi novateur même aprés 7 ans. La série portal est un must have mais je vous recommande, avant de l'acheté de le prendre tout les jeux dévellopés par Valve au sein de cet univers (et oui ça fait beaucoup). Un chef d'eouvre classique qui vaut au minimum un coup d'oeil, au mieux 10 heures de plaisirs.

Игра, как и все игры от Valve, отличная. Но я бы не советовал бы её покупать, если бы не ко-оп. Ко-оп просто шикарный. Много разнообразных уровней, в которых, конечно же нужно поднапрячь мозг. Присутсвуют жесты, указания, что-бы объяснить своему напарнику.  Возможно найдуться сторонники моей теории, но я считаю, что нет смысла покупать одиночную игру, вы спросите: "Тогда зачем ты её купил?". Это Valve Complete Pack, новогоднее выгодное предложение 2016 года. Но Portal и Portal 2 с кооперативом я проходил оочень давно с другом, благо на пиратках тоже ко-оп работал. Ну, я всё описал, кроме одиночной игры, хотя там описывать по сути нечего:"Крутой сюжет, графика+оптимизация на уровне, логическое мышление активировано", а покупать или нет, решать вам.
Не играйте с девушкой, иначе она будет считать вас МЕГАТУМЫМ

This is one on the first PC games I've ever played, and led me to build my own computer and start learning programming. Aside from nostalgia, this game has challenging puzzles, a great storyline, and great mechanics. The gameplay is smooth. The co-op campaign is some of the most fun you can have with a friend. It has a wide range of levels that cannot be completed without each player being in charge of the other's life.

アクションゲームには何かしらパズル要素がないわけではないが、純粋にパズルだけというゲームは他に類を見ない。
ただし、だからPortal 2はすばらしいと言う訳ではないことに注意して欲しい。

better than the first witch was amazing, has better puzzles and has more details on lore.

It's good, I found the physics, the puzzles, the general mechanics, just general good in the whole game. Even though I recommend the first game along with this one, the first one was very short, I beat it in about two hours. This game though, it had a fine length for the single player campaign which took about, 8 hours and that seems like a decent enough time for a game like this. Plus there a lot more to do with portal 2 after like the co-op mode and the custom made maps and all that jazz you gotta eat up. 

I really liked the characters, as few as them as there were, but it's quality over quanity here, as I enjoyed them all. The story is something I found to be rather simple but, that's okay, nothing needs to be super complex (beyond some of the puzzle which can get challenging) because it does it's job. Also I did exchange a few good laughs with the writing, or plenty of good laughs, I found the writing rather funny personally.

Overall, just from the single-player mode, there's a lot to like and I need to play this game more to see what it has to offer. There's one room in the game though that just, sucks though, you'll know it when you run into it. Beyond that I had a general positive time with the game. Get it, and the first portal as well, if you want.

Seguito dell'indimenticabile Portal, ma non al suo livello.
Bellissimo, per carità, però è troppo espanso e molto più difficile rispetto al primo.
Le scelte artistiche non sono granchè, i gel sono odiosi, e la lunghezza è notevole.
Bello, però dovete apprezzarlo come il primo per finirlo.

Un jeu de génie. Une histoire de génie, des plot twists de génie, des énigmes de génie, de l'humour de génie, des personnages de génie, des bruitages de génie, une fin de génie. Un classique du puzzle. Je recommande VIVEMENT.

P-Body and Atlas both have "Five" letters 
Chell has "Five" letters too , coincidence? I don't think so 
Three of my friends have this game, you know what else has the number "Three"? 
That's right! Lithium (Li) which is the third element in the Periodic Table 
Lithium has "Seven" letters 
"7-5 = 2"
Portal 2 is the second game of the Portal series
Portal was the first 
"1+2 = 3"
